Army officers at press conference
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Three men sitting at a table
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Military uniforms; Press conferences; Soldiers; United States. Army. Dept. of West Point
Groves, Leslie R., 1896-1970; Nichols, Kenneth D., 1907-; Taylor, Maxwell D. (Maxwell Davenport), 1901-1987
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: See Oak Ridge Journal article on October 3, 1946. "The threesome above, who held a press conference Tuesday are Colonel Kenneth D. Nichols, District Engineer; Major General Maxwell D. Taylor, Superintendent of the USMA; and Major General Leslie R. Groves, Commanding Officer of the Manhattan Project."
3061-4; 10-1-1946; Col. K. D. Nichols; Gen Maxwell D. Taylor; Gen L. R. Groves-Press Conference
